title: Extra bonus RP is here for a limited time!

replies.body: i didn't get my extra bonus rp for my 50$ i spent. i only got 7600 instead of 7900 :c Help please

"$50.00 AUD – 7600 RP (6000 + 800 standard bonus RP + 800 extra bonus RP)"

Can you not read? Or not math? You only get 7600...
I think rito said that they will pay us the bonus rp back if we got it on January 12th before 12:30 PM

"ok just wondering why  Nz gets less RP when paying and aussie gets more "? ... explain ?
its because of the differences in AUD and NZD. AUD is worth more so we get more RP for buying

then make an aussie bank account and pay with AUD. solved!
I've always found the prices from nz to au a lot different even though the exchange is fuck all difference. the other day i was at a surf shop and a hat was $29 AUD but $39 NZD lol..
Thats so true, theres only a 4 cent difference so why do us Kiwis lose so much RP compared to Aussies?

The AUD recently slumped enormously to about $0.80USD after being over $0.95USD for several years. Perhaps that has something to do with why the difference between our currencies isn't great at the moment.
http://www.loadedfortravel.co.nz/ pay a bit in fees but better than Riot exchange rates
Just change the purchase country and pay with your pay pal/visa like normal

Will I get the extra RP through purchasing through the store in LoL using PayPal?

So I redeemed a $25 card last night (11th January) at around 6:15-6:30PM, and of course, received 3280 RP. I was wondering if I am eligible for the bonus as per "*Anyone that redeemed RP on January 12th before 12:30 PM AEDT will have their extra bonus RP credited properly in the next few days.*" or not. Considering if I redeemed it only six hours later, I would know for sure that I would receive the bonus. However, I feel a little "cheated" (for lack of a better term) by such a small difference in timing...

they told us like a week ago that rp was going on sale. should have noticed it all over home page on lol client
